cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.description: Detailed information about cookies and tracking technologies used on ShakiraBr.
cookies.management: Cookie Management: You can control cookies through the consent banner or browser settings.
cookies.whatAreDesc: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website. They help us improve your experience, analyze site traffic and personalize content.
